attributes.action: Review NHS FP10 Prescription Charges inline with S3 ECtHR Human Rights.
attributes.additional_details:
https://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/2019/05/13/nhs-threatening-millions-fines-validly-claiming-free-prescriptions/

Prescription charges backfire on UK health and wealth - The Pharmaceutical Journal21 JUL 2017
attributes.background: Ever since the inclusion of Prescription Fees, Hundreds of Thousands of Service Users (SU) are put at a detriment.FP10 Forms do not reflect current Parliamentary Legislation, Legislation is left open for interpretation.  Conversely the NHSBA has applied a detriment to millions of insubordinate SU's.

rejection.details: You could start a new petition setting out clearly what you would like the Government to review or how you would like the Government to change prescription charges.
